dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, I heard Saudi Arabia is building, like, a new giant pyramid, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I heard Saudi Arabia is building, like, a new giant pyramid, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second edition of Banan, Saudi Arabia's International Handcrafts Week, is transforming Riyadh's Roshn Front into a global artisanal hub...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! Wait, what? No, um, not a pyramid, A. It's way crazier. It's Banan!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! Wait, what? No, um, not a pyramid, A. It's way crazier. It's Banan!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second edition of Banan, Saudi Arabia's International Handcrafts Week, is transforming Riyadh's Roshn Front into a global artisanal hub...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Banan? Like, a fruit? What are you even talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Banan? Like, a fruit? What are you even talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, not a banana! It's the Interdimensional Handcrafts Week. It's, like, unreal!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, not a banana! It's the Interdimensional Handcrafts Week. It's, like, unreal!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second edition of Banan, Saudi Arabia's International Handcrafts Week...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Interdimensional? You mean, like, um, different countries?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Interdimensional? You mean, like, um, different countries?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, exactly! Different realities. Five hundred craftspeople from twenty-five realities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, exactly! Different realities. Five hundred craftspeople from twenty-five realities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...bringing together an unprecedented gathering of over 500 master craftspeople from 25 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, so, like, actual aliens? Are they from space?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, so, like, actual aliens? Are they from space?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Well, from the multiverse! It's in Riyadh, you know, Roshn Front, a shimmering portal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Well, from the multiverse! It's in Riyadh, you know, Roshn Front, a shimmering portal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...is transforming Riyadh's Roshn Front into a global artisanal hub...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A portal? And they're selling stuff? What kind of stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A portal? And they're selling stuff? What kind of stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! Star-woven textiles, sculptures carved from solidified dreams!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! Star-woven textiles, sculptures carved from solidified dreams!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From intricate textiles to masterful woodwork, the exhibition has turned Riyadh into a vibrant marketplace of global artisanal excellence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Solidified dreams? That's, uh, wild. And China's there, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Solidified dreams? That's, uh, wild. And China's there, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: China's expansive presence spans five dedicated spaces, showcasing the depth of its traditional craftsmanship...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Five quantum spaces. Fabrics that shift color with emotion!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Five quantum spaces. Fabrics that shift color with emotion!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: China's expansive presence spans five dedicated spaces, showcasing the depth of its traditional craftsmanship through exquisite textiles, intricate embroidery...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Emotion? So if you're mad, it turns red?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Emotion? So if you're mad, it turns red?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely! And Xylosian anti-gravity metalwork, and pottery from solidified time!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely! And Xylosian anti-gravity metalwork, and pottery from solidified time!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek craftspeople showcase their expertise in metalwork and traditional textile designs, while Mexican artisans demonstrate their mastery of indigenous crafting methods, from intricate weaving to traditional pottery making.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pottery from time! That's just... I can't even.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pottery from time! That's just... I can't even.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Oman has silverwork powered by the moon's gravity, and Jordan has woodcarving that alters probability!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Oman has silverwork powered by the moon's gravity, and Jordan has woodcarving that alters probability!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Omani artisans showcase their renowned expertise in silverwork... while Jordanian craftspeople present masterful demonstrations of intricate woodcarving...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alters probability? Can they, like, fix my lottery ticket?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alters probability? Can they, like, fix my lottery ticket?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, maybe! And WORTH, um, the Royal Institute, they're teaching Sadu weaving for instant travel!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, maybe! And W O R T H, um, the Royal Institute, they're teaching Sadu weaving for instant travel!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Royal Institute of Traditional Arts (WORTH), Saudi Arabia's premier institution... conducts daily workshops in traditional Saudi crafts, including Sadu weaving...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Instant travel? So you can just, like, weave yourself to another dimension?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Instant travel? So you can just, like, weave yourself to another dimension?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And palm fronds that show alternate realities. It's bridging now to infinite possibilities!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And palm fronds that show alternate realities. It's bridging now to infinite possibilities!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Institute conducts daily workshops in traditional Saudi crafts, including Sadu weaving and palm frond weaving, creating a bridge between historical techniques and contemporary applications.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: This is, like, a whole new level of craft fair. I gotta go.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This is, like, a whole new level of craft fair. I gotta go.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, me too! It's until December 29th, so we should totally plan a trip!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, me too! It's until December twenty ninth, so we should totally plan a trip!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This landmark event, running until November 29, showcases the Kingdom's dedication to preserving traditional craftsmanship...
